Posts.Content: Hello, I'm knew to all this and on the site and I kind of have the same relationship with food although I'm not overweight I carry alot on my middle so it all goes there which is larger than it should be.  I'm just trying to eat oranges and fruit, I eat loads of veg but fruit I struggle with.  I was diagnosed with breast cancer in January and had lumpectomy and lymph nodes removed which they found a small ammount of cells which shouldn't of been there. I'm still in a fog I guess and just trying to say your not alone, it's awful waiting. Just try incorporate a few low calorie options in your diet, it's kind of worked for me, I've only put on two pound, where other stressful times in life its usually a stone or there about. I've stopped eating crisps altogether as really can't just have the one packet  If you come across any handy tips please let me know  Sending you a hug  M xxxx
Posts.Title: Overeating while in the waiting game
